net.sytes.botg.array

Class ArUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sytes.botg.array.ArUtils

  • public class ArUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains helper methods for array creation, function checks for size, indices, etc.
    and 2D console print methods for MATLAB like output
    Author:
    hillenbrand
